document.full_text: kansas governor sam brownback has signed two anti-abortion bills, including one that bans abortion after 21 weeks based on the view that a fetus can feel pain at that point, officials said tuesday.
document.title: kansas governor sam brownback signs bills restricting abortion
lines_and_colors: kansas governor sam brownback has signed two anti-abortion bills, including one that bans abortion after 21 weeks based on the view that a fetus can feel pain at that point, officials said tuesday.
